hicpp-noexcept-move.description:
Description

This check is an alias for
performance-noexcept-move-constructor
.
Checks
rule 12.5.4
to mark move assignment and move construction
noexcept
.
hicpp-noexcept-move.option:
Static analysis (Clang-Tidy) options are configured via .clang-tidy file.

This rule has no specific options.
